name: Spaceman
description:
Embark on this amazing journey and enjoy the freedom and the challenges of space exploration.
Spaceman is a retro-adventure game made by indie studio Conmtrast.
In this first chapter of Spaceman, you need to enter and explore the Temple of Mosha in order to rescue Sera. Gather resources to keep your weapon and jetpack working, collect all the artifacts across the temple and open the portal to find Sera!... and something else, maybe? Or don't. Just explore and keep yourself alive. That's pretty much cool as well.
